title: StellarValueExt
description:
StellarValueExt is an XDR NestedUnion defines as:

```text union switch (StellarValueType v) { case STELLAR_VALUE_BASIC: void; case STELLAR_VALUE_SIGNED: LedgerCloseValueSignature lcValueSignature; } ```

LedgerCloseValueSignature.description:
LedgerCloseValueSignature is an XDR Struct defines as:

```text struct LedgerCloseValueSignature { NodeID nodeID;       // which node introduced the value Signature signature; // nodeID's signature }; ```

Signature.description:
Signature is an XDR Typedef defines as:

```text typedef opaque Signature<64>; ```
